the definitive aliens game emphasis on the s  dark descent aims at capturing the military scifi vibe of the second film it might seem obvious for aliens to be adapted as an fps but dark descent proves that the most stressful role in the film is in fact the guy yelling orders helplessly from the armored personnel carrier 910 would watch my squad die again
